#summary Project overview.

= Introduction =

OpenSudoku is a simple sudoku game for Android mobile OS. Project is in very early stage and no external contributions to the code are accepted at this time.

Here is prototype's screenshot:

http://opensudoku-android.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/OpenSudoku/wiki/opensudoku.png

I'm planning to release first working version by the end of March 2009.
